name: Shores Unknown Demo
detailed_description:
Shores Unknown is a single-player tactical RPG featuring an innovative gridless battle system combined with epic fights against huge bosses and enemy armies.
This is a work-in-progress demo which contains the beginning hour of the first story chapter of the game.
about_the_game:
Shores Unknown is a single-player tactical RPG featuring an innovative gridless battle system combined with epic fights against huge bosses and enemy armies.
This is a work-in-progress demo which contains the beginning hour of the first story chapter of the game.
short_description: Shores Unknown is a single-player tactical RPG featuring an innovative gridless battle system combined with epic fights against huge bosses and enemy armies. This is a work-in-progress demo which contains the beginning hour of the first story chapter of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or ATI™ equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: fantasy violence, strong language and references to alcohol, fantasy drugs and sexual acts (no direct visualization or nudity).
